EmailTemplate.name: Turbonomic and the Future of IT (1493402570.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic and the Future of IT (1493402570.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 98 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Michael,I wanted to reach out because I know Breakthru Beverage Group is looking at Migration projects a well as increasing their performance as well as being efficient as possible. Because of this I thought it would make sense for us to connect to introduce you to Turbonomic Rather than a typical elemental tool, our platform operates as a single-pane of glass driving real-time automatable decisions for all the leading on premise hypervisors and across all the major public cloud providers. Not to mention, we have out-of-the box capability to plug into all layers of your environment from applications down to storage in order to prevent the ripple effects that can come from making disjointed decisions in the software-defined data center. Cisco, Verizon, HPE & BMC have seen a: - 37% increase in application performance - 40% increase in VM/host density - 80% decrease in troubleshooting and ticketing Turbonomic Overview <[[http://t.sidekickopen69.com/e1t/c/5/f18dQhb0S7lC8dDMPbW2n0x6l2B9nMJN7t5XYgdVn3dW8qSQCx76hVPRN72kTf31sBwYf7xKJSz03?t=https%3A%2F%2Fturbonomic.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2FTurbonomic-Workload-Edition.pdf&si=6013571735748608&pi=506778dc-f66c-4c92-a181-578bc0c9b471]]> My goal is to set up an introduction in the next couple weeks to show you why EMC, Nike & Barclays Bank (to name a few) are utilizing us today. Are you available for a conversation second week of may? Best, Kathleen NorchiSales, East440-708-8477
